description: A front-end developer passionate about clean code and user-focused design.
disclaimer: This site is still a work in progress, and so is the translation; come back every now and again to check out the progress!

projects.title: AEMMA Ottawa website
projects.desc: A bilingual, responsive website for my historical martial arts group. Built with React + Vite and styled using Tailwind CSS. Includes multilingual JSON-based content (React i18Next), an event system, dynamic modals, and responsive layouts.

projects.title: Friendship Bracelet Generator
projects.desc: An interactive app allowing users to customize virtual friendship bracelets with adjustable bead colours, shapes, curved strings, fonts, and more. Developed using React, Vite, and the Canvas API, using client-side processing.

projects.title: Max and Ray wedding site
projects.desc: A simple site built with HTML and JS and styled with SASS. Passes user input data to a custom google sheet document for wedding RSVPs, add-to-calendar button, and custom visual effects.

experience.employer: Government of Canada - Courts Administration Service
experience.desc: The Courts Administration Service supports the Federal Courts by providing registry, judicial, and corporate services, ensuring access to justice for Canadians through efficient handling of disputes and legal matters.

experience.employer: Government of Canada - Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
experience.desc: Supporting immigration programs, delivering citizenship services, protecting refugees, and facilitating the issuance of Canadian travel documents.
